remarks: Morphism part of the identity arrow.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
statement:
idafval.i $e |- I = ( IdA ` C ) $.
idafval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
idafval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
idafval.1 $e |- .1. = ( Id ` C ) $.
idaval.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
ida2 $p |- ( ph -> ( 2nd ` ( I ` X ) ) = ( .1. ` X ) ) $.
